summary:
# GPU Dedicated Server

**Experience High Speed With Latest Gen Technology**

With the highest level of control, performance, and security to handle big
traffic, our GPU Dedicated Server solutions are fully optimized for speed,
security, and scalability. Our 24/7 customer support, perpetual security, and
high-speed performance, give you an amazing GPU server hosting experience.

Buy Now

Get extreme performance with GPU-powered virtual workstations.

Get started in minutes. Deploy multiple workstations or scale down, depending
on your workload.

Easily collaborate with colleagues or freelancers with enterprise-grade
security and control over your data.

Unlimited data transfer and high-definition experience.

Get instant deployment, more power, quick cooling, storage, high uptime, and
an elevated level of security with Collocations

## Deploy Popular 3D Software

## Accelerate Performance with Superfast Nvidia GPUs

Nvidia GTX 1080

Nvidia GTX 1080Ti

Nvidia RTX A5000

## Advantages of VPS Hosting

Cost Savings

VPS Servers provide better speed, performance and reliability as compared to
Shared Servers yet their prices are quite affordable. Our VPS Servers start
from just $10/mo. However, the cheap pricing varies from one provider to
another.

Better Reliability

In VPS Hosting each server is virtually separated from another. Therefore the
tasks performed on your neighbouring servers won’t affect your server
performance. Your websites and applications run independently on a VPS Server.

Greater Control

With our VPS Hosting, you will get Root Level Access to your Server. You will
have complete control to change commands, update OS, install software and
customize the server as per your needs.

Improved performance

Our VPS Servers enhance your website performance by providing you independent
server environment with greater scalability, improved reliability, and premium
server resources.

Advanced Security

In a VPS Server, there are a limited number of root admins reducing the risk
of security breaches. Further, our virtual private servers are secured with
DDoS Protection and Firewalls and undergo regular monitoring.

Higher Scalability

As your business grows the need for more server resources arises. With both
our Linux and Windows VPS Hosting plans you can easily scale the RAM,
Bandwidth, CPU Cores, and Storage as and when the need arises.

## Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

### What VPS means?

VPS stands for Virtual Private Server. It is the web hosting server that
provides a virtual, private, and secure hosting environment. Further, it
serves as the ideal middle way solution between shared and dedicated server
hosting.

### What is USA VPS?

USA VPS is a virtual private server hosting plan offered by Serverwala. We
offer VPS Hosting Services in 4 Locations in the USA - New York, Phoenix, San
Jose, and Dallas. Moreover, we are expanding our server infrastructure and
will soon release VPS plans in several more locations in the U.S.

### What can you do with a VPS?

With VPS, you get the privilege to successfully host -  
Multiple websites for your web business  
Resource-hungry applications  
A website with a high-traffic volume  
Gaming platforms  
Run and secure databases and much more.  
Moreover, virtual private server hosting lets you eliminate all the hosting
restrictions and limitations you can encounter with shared server hosting.

### Do you accept payment of the VPS USA Plan through Cryptocurrencies?

Yes, we accept payment for all our plans and packages through
cryptocurrencies. You can pay through Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDC, Dogecoin, etc.

### What are the security features available with the US Virtual Server?

With the US VPS server, you get various standard and advanced security
features, including data encryption, DDoS protection, malware scan &
protection, antivirus software, and secure networking channels. Further, you
also get the possibility to implement additional security measures from your
end to ensure the complete protection of your data.

### Do you also provide Managed VPS Hosting in USA?

Yes, we provide Managed VPS Hosting Services in the USA at a reasonable price.
But the plans and pricing shown above are for Unmanaged VPS. For managed
services you may get in touch with our sales team through Email:
sales@serverwala.com Call: +91 9772222179 and Live Chat.

### What will you get with Managed VPS Server?

With the managed hosting services, we provide the dynamic and intricate
administration of your virtual private server’s base setup that incorporates
significant aspects such as -  
Installation and configuration of core operating system server  
24/7 server and network maintenance  
99.90% Uptime network assurance  
Diligent monitoring of hardware performance  
Active protection and patching of operating system  
Implementation of strong malware security  
Proactive service monitoring (Ping, DNS, SSH, FTP, HTTP, POP/IMAP/MySQL)  
Functional and adequate backup solutions maintenance (you need to purchase a
backup plan as an add on with your hosting plan if required)  
Proper documentation as well as on-demand assistance  
Updating software updates and other server-level management.  
Moreover, you being an account owner, handle and operate the website-based
activities as well as tasks. With the managed hosting services with VPS, you
acquire a good amount of time to invest in developing your website and other
elements of your online business.

### Do you provide both Linux and Windows OS with VPS USA?

Yes, we provide a free operating system with all our VPS Hosting Plans
including USA VPS. You may choose the OS version as per your choice during
checkout without any extra charges. Further, we also offer multiple control
panel options as an add-on with our VPS Hosting Plans.
